original_title: Shooting from the Heart: Chris Menges, Cameraman
overview: A look at the career of Oscar-winning cameraman Chris Menges. Filmed on location of 'Comfort and Joy'. Chris Menges discusses his early career in television and film. Featuring interviews with Bill Forsyth, Bill Paterson, Ken Loach, Neil Jordan, and Jeremy Isaacs.
title: Shooting from the Heart: Chris Menges, Cameraman
